title: Sanders Responds To Streamer Claim: Coach denies college offer to Rakai; praises teen’s effort
summary_full: Deion Sanders reacted after streamer Rakai claimed the Colorado coach offered him a college football deal during NFL Pro Bowl weekend. In a Well Off Media video, Sanders praised Rakai’s effort but questioned whether he is a college athlete right now. The exchange sparked debate online and gave fans plenty to discuss.
